Actions.Name: Delete AdverseEvent ID
Actions.Description: Actual or potential/avoided event causing unintended physical injury resulting from or contributed to by medical care

Actions.Name: Delete AllergyIntolerance ID
Actions.Description: Risk of harmful or undesirable, physiological response which is unique to an individual and associated with exposure to a substance.

Actions.Name: Delete CarePlan ID
Actions.Description: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient

Actions.Name: Delete Condition ID
Actions.Description: A clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern.

Actions.Name: Delete DiagnosticReport ID
Actions.Description: The findings and interpretation of diagnostic tests performed on patients

Actions.Name: Delete Medication ID
Actions.Description: This resource is primarily used for the identification and definition of a medication for the purposes of prescribing, dispensing, and administering

Actions.Name: Delete MedicationRequest ID
Actions.Description: An order or request for both supply of the medication and the instructions for administration of the medication to a patient.

Actions.Name: Delete MedicationStatement ID
Actions.Description: A record of a medication that is being consumed by a patient

Actions.Name: Delete Observation ID
Actions.Description: Observations are used to support diagnosis, monitor progress, determine baselines and patterns and even capture demographic characteristics

Actions.Name: Delete Procedure ID
Actions.Description: An action that is or was performed on or for a patient

Actions.Name: Delete RiskAssessment ID
Actions.Description: An assessment of the likely outcome(s) for a patient or other subject as well as the likelihood of each outcome.
